page.title: Historical Data Management
page.description: Upload and process historical invoice files

toast.processingStartedDesc: Batch processing has begun, please wait for completion

fileDetail.notFoundDesc: File ID: {id} does not exist or has been deleted

empty.title: No batches
empty.description: Create a new batch to start uploading files

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete Batch
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this batch? All files within the batch will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

createBatchDialog.title: Create New Batch
createBatchDialog.description: Create a new batch to upload historical data files

name.label: Batch Name
name.description: Give the batch an easy-to-identify name

enable.label: Enable Company Identification
enable.description: Automatically identify and match company data from documents

fuzzyThreshold.label: Fuzzy Match Threshold
fuzzyThreshold.description: Match similarity must reach this threshold to be considered the same company (recommended 85-95%)

autoMerge.label: Auto Merge Similar Companies
autoMerge.description: Automatically merge similar company names into one company

enable.label: Enable Term Aggregation
enable.description: Automatically aggregate term statistics after batch processing

similarityThreshold.label: Term Similarity Threshold
similarityThreshold.description: Terms with similarity reaching this threshold will be considered the same term (recommended 80-90%)

autoClassify.label: Auto Classify Terms
autoClassify.description: Use AI to automatically classify terms into expense categories

enable.label: Enable Issuer Identification
enable.description: Identify issuing company from document Logo/Header/Letterhead

confidenceThreshold.label: Identification Confidence Threshold
confidenceThreshold.description: Only accept identification results when confidence reaches this threshold (recommended 60-80%)

fuzzyThreshold.label: Company Match Threshold
fuzzyThreshold.description: Match similarity must reach this threshold to be considered the same issuing company (recommended 85-95%)

autoCreate.label: Auto Create Issuer Company
autoCreate.description: Automatically create new company when no existing company matches
